title: This is why talking about money with our kids is so important
description: For years, we always used cash envelopes for most of our purchases. It worked well to help us stick with our budget, but we slowly moved over to just using our debit cards and tracking everything through YouNeedABudget. It has worked well, until the other day when I realized it wasnâ€™t working as well asRead More
